title: Overcoming resistance to change [B/W]
creator_credit: Leon S. Gold and Roundtable Films
brief_description: Explains emotional factors causing resistance to new methods to industry, and shows how supervisors can deal with problems of this kind by developing participation and discussion of problems and reducing hostility.
